author: dlr
msg: svnmerge.py style change.
* contrib/client-side/svnmerge.py
(get_repo_root, action_avail, _find_common, CommandOpts.Cmd.Replace,
main): Replace assertion conditionals which used 0 with the
constant False (which is guaranteed present by some compat
initialization code).

author: dlr
msg: * www/merge-tracking/requirements.html
(summary): Renamed the "Show Available Change Sets for Merge"
requirement to "Show Change Sets Available for Merge" for
consistency with its inverse.
(cherry-picking, manual-merge): Note use case dependency on "Show
Change Sets Available for Merge".
(rollback-merge): Note use case dependency on "Show Change Sets
Available for Merge" and "Show Change Sets Already Merged".

author: dlr
msg: * www/merge-tracking/requirements.html
(summary): Add "Show Change Sets Already Merged" requirement to the
"Auditing" section (it's already present in the details).

author: jerenkrantz
msg: ra_serf: Simplify some calls to open_dir in update reporters and don't lose
errors.
* subversion/libsvn_ra_serf/update.c
(close_all_dirs, start_report, end_report): Don't duplicate the check in
open_dir() and wrap all invocations with SVN_ERR.

author: nori
msg: Japanese translation in the 1.3.x branch updates.
* subversion/po/ja.po: Merge update of ja.po in the trunk tree at
Now ja.po has 1390 translated messages against r19096 (Emacs PO-mode
